difficulty.justification: Requires knowledge of skin structure and temperature regulation mechanisms

sub_questions.text: Identify the parts labelled B and C.
Describe how part B is involved in maintaining a constant body temperature when the external temperature drops.
Part A is unevenly distributed in human skin. Name part A and suggest reasons for this uneven distribution.
The thickness of layer D can change over several months. Suggest and explain one reason for a decrease in the thickness.

images.description: Diagram of human skin with labeled parts A, B, C, and D
